sentences.sContent: A really weird thing happened last night.
sentences.sCn: 昨晚发生了一件非常奇怪的事。

sentences.sContent: They sell all sorts of weird and wonderful (= very strange ) products.
sentences.sCn: 他们出售各种稀奇古怪的产品。

sentences.sContent: ...Rather than just another weird episode in the town that brought you protesting environmentalists...

synos.tran: 怪异的；不可思议的；超自然的

remMethod.val: we(我们) ＋ ird(看作bird， 鸟) → 如果我们都变成鸟该多么古怪啊 → 古怪的

trans.tranCn: 古怪的， 离奇的； 怪诞的， 神秘而可怕的
trans.tranOther: very strange and unusual, and difficult to understand or explain
